head.charity_text: We are where we are needed
head.work_text: We take care of our boys and girls on the front line, help children, the elderly, hospitals and orphanages

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.text: We are raising money for cool armor, night vision devices and drones - only the best, only the most needed.

civilians.title: Civilians
civilians.text: We evacuate civilians from the war zone. We help with food, clothing, medicines, and hygiene.

medicine.title: Medicine
medicine.text: We bring the most necessary medicines to hot spots and assemble cool first aid kits following NATO's example

help.donate_text: Donate to us! This is the easiest and most effective way to support the Foundation's activities.
help.report_text_second: every month. Everything is transparent, all the money goes to help the army.
help.join_text: Or join our team. To do so, just write to us.

form.need_help: Do you need help? Want to join the team?
form.name: Name
form.hint_success: Your request has been successfully sent! We will review it as soon as possible and send our response to your E-Mail
form.hint_error: Oops! Unable to process request. Try again later.
form.hint_email_security: We'll never share your email with anyone else.

footer.copyright: CO "Charitable Foundation "Archangels of Kyiv". All rights reserved.
